tool_description: Preserves important content structure and formatting elements during chunking to maintain document integrity.

text_content.description: The text content with structure to preserve

preserve_code_blocks.description: Whether to preserve code block structures

error_messages: Empty text content: Provide non-empty text content for structure preservation.
No preservable structure: Text does not contain any recognizable structure elements to preserve.
usage: Provide text_content and configure which structural elements to preserve. Returns text with preserved structure markers.

structure_map.description: Map of preserved structural elements and their positions
